'''Darsh Nyach''' was a salesman and peer of [[Baldurian]] society.
document_data.Description: Darsh was a well-known merchant of canvas used for making sails. Even though he was a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]], he lived outside the [[Upper City]].
document_data.Relationships: He had a son called [[Omdarsh Nyach|Omdarsh]].
document_data.History: In [[1482 DR]], [[Rilsa Rael]] wished to abduct a member of Darsh's family, and settled on kidnapping his son.
